data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yang, Zizhong, Xu, Xin (2018): Two new species of the trapdoor spider genus Conothele Thorell, 1878 (Mygalomorphae: Halonoproctidae) from China. Zootaxa 4442 (1): 171-180, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4442.1.10|5 occurrences
